categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Vij Markos was a Gran male Jedi Master who served the Jedi Order during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire.

Around 3641 BBY, Jedi Master Markos was stationed on Belsavis where he discovered an ancient and powerful being, named Elshuu, imprisoned in Belsavis thousands of years ago. He believed that the Elshuu's fanatical disciples had awoken and were trying to free their master. He tasked a Republic spacer to confront Elshuu and ensure he never escaped Belsavis.
